title: Pset_CoveringFlooring
description: Properties common to the definition of all occurrence and type objects of covering with the predefined type set to FLOORING.

HasNonSkidSurface.title: HasNonSkidSurface
HasNonSkidSurface.description: Indication whether the surface finish is designed to prevent slippery (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

HasAntiStaticSurface.title: HasAntiStaticSurface
HasAntiStaticSurface.description: Indication whether the surface finish is designed to prevent electrostatic charge (TRUE) or not (FALSE).
